project-subtitle: 下面是我的工作经历和项目经验
project-1:
Full-stack (Next, Nest, Mongodb, Docker-compose, and Cloud VPS + Nginx.)

Built an e-commerce site allowing customers to purchase personalized clothing.
Integrated Stripe, Google, and Cloudinary APIs for an enhanced user experience.
Implemented a highly modular backend server adhering to REST standards.

Deployed test and production versions using technologies such as Docker Compose on the OVH server with nginx configured.
project-2:
Full-stack (Angular, Nodejs, Express, Mongodb, Docker-compose)

Maintaining an administration interface for managing orders, inventory, and generating personalized invoices using technologies such as Angular and Tailwind CSS.

The server is based on a microservices architecture with Hapi, and deployment is automated using to GitLab CI/CD and Docker Compose.
project-3:
DevOps (docker-compose, Apache Hadoop with Talent Studio)

Containerize a back-end service project for OnPremise deployment. Use docker, docker-compose and dockerHub to reduce installation costs.

Following the first step, approve the service in Cloud mode (AWS).
